title: CNBC Daily Open: The Fed wants inflation at 2%. But the economy may be fine with higher inflation
description: The 2% inflation target has been repeated so often by central bankers that it seems crucial to a healthy economy. That may be wrong.

title: United says it will make it easier for families to book seats with their children for free
description: United Airlines says it will open up more seats to families seeking to sit together without paying a fee.

title: A nutritionist shares the 'most underrated' food she eats every day to boost her energy
description: Nutritionist and food expert Lauren Manaker shares the unexpected food she eats every day to boost her energy — and it's not coffee.

title: Covid's 'legacy of weirdness': Layoffs spread, but some employers can't hire fast enough
description: Retail sales and other economic data has been positive, despite inflation and rising interest rates.

title: The 10 highest-paying college majors, five years after graduation
description: If you want to get paid the most right after graduating, study to be an engineer.

title: The curious history of the Federal Reserve's 2% inflation targeting, explained
description: As the world shifts to a new post-pandemic normal, the inflation targets of central banks across the world have faced new scrutiny.

title: Artificial Intelligence is booming – but how will it impact your career?
description: Artificial Intelligence is the latest technology buzz topic thanks to the boom of ChatGPT. But are concerns about AI taking over people's jobs warranted?

title: President Joe Biden makes surprise visit to Kyiv just days before one-year anniversary of Ukraine war
description: U.S. President Joe Biden made a surprise visit to Kyiv, Ukraine Monday in a show of solidarity, almost a year after Russia began its full-scale invasion of the country.

title: Cybersecurity firm Darktrace hires EY to review financial processes after damning short seller report
description: Darktrace's board chair said the decision to launch a third-party review was a sign of its confidence in the robustness of the company's financial processes.

title: One year on, Russia's war in Ukraine ramps up fears over Europe's next security 'soft spot'
description: Concerns over Russia's influence in the Western Balkans have intensified since the Kremlin's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

title: Ukraine can still lose the war — but Russia can’t win, Ian Bremmer says
description: "Ukraine can lose this war," Ian Bremmer told CNBC at the Munich Security Conference Friday, but Russia can't win at a geopolitical level.

title: India hits back after George Soros says Adani troubles will greatly weaken Modi's grip on power
description: "Modi and business tycoon Adani are close allies; their fate is intertwined," said billionaire investor George Soros

title: CNBC Daily Open: Growth stocks look hot but investors should be cautious
description: The Nasdaq had its sixth positive week in seven. Yet further interest rate hikes by the  Federal Reserve seem imminent. Markets may be too optimistic.

title: 'China's Netflix' iQiyi launches an immersive VR ride based on its own show
description: The experience is based on iQiyi's 2021 television drama "Luoyang," set in the ancient Chinese capital city of the same name.

title: Reopening to recovery: Goldman Sachs sees China stocks surging as much as 24% by end of 2023
description: Goldman Sachs strategists see an economic shift from "reopening to recovery" driving Chinese stocks 24% higher by the end of this year.

title: World Wide Web inventor Tim Berners-Lee calls crypto 'dangerous' and likens it to gambling
description: "It's only speculative. Obviously, that's really dangerous," Tim Berners-Lee told CNBC. "[It's] if you want to have a kick out of gambling, basically."

title: China formalizes rules for overseas IPOs
description: The new rules also call for IPO underwriters, typically international investment banks, to annually report to the CSRC their involvement with Chinese listings overseas.

title: The SEC has a stablecoin firm in its sights — and it could shake up the whole $137 billion market
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) could be gearing up to take action against Paxos, over the issue of whether Binance USD (BUSD) is a security.

title: Formula 1: The FIA clarifies free speech rule after fierce backlash from Lewis Hamilton and drivers
description: The FIA said they can "express their views on any political, religious or personal matter" in "their own space" but will face sanctions if they defy law on track.

title: Trade tensions seen hanging over U.S. firms' caution over China
description: Foreign multinationals in the U.S and Europe are getting more cautious about their capital investments in China due to geopolitical concerns, said consultancy.

title: The most expensive home in the Caribbean just listed for $200 million – take a look inside
description: The Terraces spans 17 acres and nine structures. It's located on the small private Caribbean island of Mustique.
